title: Event
description: An event associated with DOGE staff doing something

time.description: An optional time value in the form HH:MM (24-hour format)

event.description: A description of the DOGE-related event

comment.description: For making any comments about the event notes

agency.description: Can be a single agency or an array of agencies affected/involved in the event

named.description: A list of DOGE staff named with the event

items.description: The names of DOGE staff in the incident.

source.description: A URL of the source for the information in the event

access_type.description: The type of the access granted/changed to

onboard_type.description: What kind of onboarding it was for DOGE staff

detailed_from.description: The agency the staff in the event were detailed from

detail_id.description: A link to a specific record in the details.yaml data if we have info on the detail

case_no.description: The relevant case_no for legal events
